definition: to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
to seal (with official stamp)/to stamp/fig. to ratify/to put lid on (cooking pot)/to cap/to build an extension or additional storey
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc)/to rebuild/to renovate

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃盖允许观察内部机制，以帮助确定和检验。

sentences.english: Finally, the Shanxi mature vinegar poured into the old, will cover the storage cap.
sentences.chinese: 最后把山西老陈醋倒入，将瓶盖盖好存放。

sentences.english: Dear Colleagues, It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴与盖特纳财长共同主持第三轮中美经济对话。

sentences.english: A charter is a mask; the lie lurks beneath it.
sentences.chinese: 宪章是个假面具，盖在那下面的是谎话。

sentences.english: The workers torn down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人们拆毁旧屋，并在原址上另盖新屋。

sentences.english: Geithner noted similar concerns in his speech this week.
sentences.chinese: 盖特纳在这周的演讲中表达了同样的担心。

sentences.english: In the desert Bridgit gives Gaines the ID.
sentences.chinese: 在沙漠中，布瑞吉特将马丁的身份证交给了盖恩斯。

sentences.english: On Thursday only 168 flights passed through Gatwick.
sentences.chinese: 周四，只有168架航班通过盖特维克机场。

sentences.english: It cost two billion dollars to build this building.
sentences.chinese: 盖这大楼花了二十亿元。

sentences.english: The record store is timestamped to denote the last time it was modified.
sentences.chinese: 记录存储被盖上时间戳来指示它上次被修改的时间。

sentences.english: Mr Geithner appealed for decisive action.
sentences.chinese: 盖那先生请求采取果断行动。

sentences.english: Twist off cap, remove quality seal.
sentences.chinese: 打开盖扭，撕掉瓶口密封。

sentences.english: All Stainless Steel lid, tank, shell, wetted parts and fittings.
sentences.chinese: 全不锈钢盖，罐，贝壳，湿零件及配件。

sentences.english: Rick asks Gaines to pay him for his completed job.
sentences.chinese: 里克向盖恩斯要求支付他的酬金，因为他完成了任务。

sentences.english: Verify that the fuel tank cap is in place and secure.
sentences.chinese: 检查以下车辆的油箱盖是否盖紧盖牢。

definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
